availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Albert Hawes Clark (Christian County, Kentucky, attorney.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, attorney. Son of Joab Clark. Farm laborer in Christian County in 1860. Deputy clerk of Christian County Court in 1865. Attorney in Christian County in 1870.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Christian, not stated, p. 316. Find A Grave, “Col Albert Hawes 'Al' Clark (November 3, 1839-May 10, 1899),” Memorial #88551098, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=88551098, (accessed June 3, 2017). KYR-0001-005-0136.
